702182f-c.text:
(1)
Williamsbridge Road, at, adjoining and north of the N. E. corner of Eastchester Road, showing, at the corner, Daly's Grill and Restaurant. The frame building on the far end of the shed is Engine 38 and Hook and Ladder 51.

August 3, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(2)
An exclusive view of Engine 38 and Hook and Ladder 51.

August 3, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(3)
The same as view 1, at a later date. The old firehouse has been replaced by a 2-story brick building.

August 25, 1935
P. L. Sperr
702182f-c.folder: Williamsbridge Road & Eastchester Road, Bronx, NY

700954f-a.text:
Eastchester Road (foreground), north side, at Williamsbridge Road, showing at the N.E. corner of the latter, the 2-story frame house of Daly's Grill and Restaurant. The view is in an easterly direction.
August 25, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
700954f-a.folder: Eastchester Road & Williamsburg Road, Bronx, NY

701795f-a.text:
Silver Street, at the N.W. corner of Williamsbridge Road.
August 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
